comments:
Have the following php code:

 <?php
//---Start Include ---->
/**
*This variable holds desired cofee type
*@var string;
*/
$cofee_type = 'cappuchino';

/** 
* This class makes cofee preparations 
*/ 
class coffee{   
   public $sugar;
   /**
   * This variable holds sugar portion for teaspoon in grams
   * @var int
   */
   private $tea_spoon;       

   function coffee($sugar){  
      /* Cappucino */  
      $this->sugar = $sugar;
      $this->tea_spoon = 20; 
   }    
   /**   
   * This function returns sugar quantities     
   * @return int   
   */   
    function add_sugar(){
       return ($this->sugar > 0)  ? $this->sugar * $this->tea_spoon : 0; 
     }
 }
$coffe_time=1;
//--- End Include ---->  
$cup = new coffee(2); 
$sugar = $cup->add_sugar(); 
echo $coffe_time;
?>
